Description:
You see a dwarf with a stiff stance looking severe. His gaze is on the elevator, until it stops in the upper levels. He turns and speaks to you.

(Dwarf) “Argh… I am Thorim, son of Thukli, the sargent of this floor. By the way, where the hell has the elevator warden gone. He better has a good excuse for not being here.

If you want to use the elevator. It is not open for you. Continue your way and don’t make me repeat it.”
DescriptionAction: Thorim hand is close to his weapon. How do you react?
